attributes.action: all national sport should be shown on bbc channels or no mandatory licence fee should be imposed.
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of the working class of this country are excluded from watching many national sporting events, in which their countries sports people are competing, unless they want to leave their homes and go and sit in a pub!
This in spite of the fact that they are compelled by a corrupt and morally bankrupt Government to pay £145 per annum for the privilege of not being able to watch them!
This outrageous situation is exacerbated by the fact that the recession, for which the working class is also paying, has made the option of going to the pub impossible due to having no cash to spare, even if there were any pubs left open worth visiting! Sport originates from and belongs to the working class, give it back or stop the mandatory licence!
